items.title: Height Adjustment
items.desc: Dual-motor electric system with anti-collision sensor. Smooth 38mm/s travel speed, 4 memory presets on LED touchpad. Manual crank option available for QX Basic.

items.title: Cable Management
items.desc: Integrated cable spine runs full desk length. Removable cable tray with brush grommet openings. Power socket modules available for desktop mounting.

items.title: Tool-Free Assembly
items.desc: Pre-assembled frame with click-lock connections. Desktop attachment with 6 screws only. Full setup in under 20 minutes by one person.

items.title: Modular Expansion
items.desc: Add return desks, screen dividers, CPU holders, monitor arms, and under-desk storage. All accessories use universal T-slot mounting system.

items.title: Smart Integration
items.desc: Optional Bluetooth module connects to Metro Desk App. Track sitting/standing time, receive reminders, and sync height presets across devices.

items.title: Ergonomic Design
items.desc: Designed with occupational therapists to promote active sitting/standing cycles. Curved front edge reduces forearm pressure. Meets EN 527 ergonomic requirements.
